p: Fig. 6, Fig. 7, Fig. 8 shows the glutathione level and antioxidant activities of CAT and SOD in the midbrain, cerebrum and cerebellum of experimental rats. Administration of rat with nitrobenzene alone showed caused a significant decrease (p < 0.05) in GSH level and decline in activities of CAT and SOD when compared with the control. However, treatment with 200 and 400 mg/kg of MLVA or Vitamin E significantly increased the GSH level and enhance all the enzyme.
